name: SAN JOAQUIN COUNCIL OF GOVERNMENTS
sampleDescriptions: Support Implementation of FAST Act, regional planning organizations issues, CMAQ funding, BUY America requirements, support for FASTLANE and TIGER programs.
FY18 (HR 1625) and FY19 Transportation, HUD appropriations, secure funding for regional highway and economic development programs.Oppose cuts in the President's FY18 budget related to the Departments
Support for HOME and CDBG programs, support for additional transitional housing.
